name: diamond-storm
effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 50% chance to raise the user's Defense by two stages for each target hit.

flavor_text_entries.x-y:
The user whips up a storm of diamonds
to damage opposing Pokémon. This may
also raise the user’s Defense stat.

The user whips up a storm of diamonds
to damage opposing Pokémon. This may
also raise the user’s Defense stat.
